title: Stewarding the stories that power tries to silence
description: As 2026 approaches, journalism finds itself in a dangerous kind of forgetfulness. Hard-won truths grow quieter by the day; the racial reckoning that once roared through newsrooms now echoes faintly beneath a tightening political silence. In that hush, the future of news hinges upon one assignment — remembering what power hopes we forget. And so...

In that hush, the future of news hinges upon one assignment — remembering what power hopes we forget. And so...
